mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM training_course_application a JOIN dog d ON a.dog_id = d.dog_id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC

SELECT a.application_id AS applicationId, a.session_id AS sessionId, a.dog_id AS dogId, a.status AS applicationStatus,
c.tags AS tags, c.title AS title, c.description AS description, c.main_image AS mainImage,
CONCAT(s.session_date, ' ', s.start_time, ' ~ ', s.end_time) AS sessionSchedule,
d.name AS dogName -- 여기 추가
FROM training_course_application a JOIN training_session s ON a.session_id = s.session_id AND s.is_deleted = 0 JOIN training_course c ON s.course_id = c.course_id AND c.is_deleted = 0 JOIN dog d ON a.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0
WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND a.is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_course_application WHERE application_id = #{applicationId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training_course_application WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND status = 'APPLIED' AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waiting (application_id, status, created_by, updated_by, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{applicationId}, 'WAITING',#{userId},#{userId}, NOW(), NOW())

mapper.update: UPDATE training_course_application SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE application_id = #{applicationId}
